tool_description: Determines optimal visual aids and multimedia elements to support speech content, including slide layouts and graphic recommendations.

presentation_type.description: Format of presentation: slides, poster, demonstration, multimedia, none

content_sections.description: Speech sections that might benefit from visual support

data_elements.description: Statistics, processes, or concepts that need visualization

venue_constraints.description: Venue limitations: large screen, projector, no tech, portable display

audience_size.description: Number of audience members for visibility planning

preparation_time.description: Available time for visual aid creation: limited, adequate, ample

error_messages: Invalid presentation type: Must be one of [slides, poster, demonstration, multimedia, none]
Empty content sections: Provide at least one content section for visual planning
Invalid venue constraints: Must be one of [large screen, projector, no tech, portable display]
Invalid audience size: Must be a positive integer
Invalid budget level: Must be one of [minimal, moderate, extensive]
Invalid preparation time: Must be one of [limited, adequate, ample]
Venue-audience mismatch: Visual aids not suitable for venue constraints and audience size
usage: Specify presentation type, content sections array, data elements, venue constraints, and audience size. Optionally set budget level and preparation time for realistic recommendations.

visual_aid_types.description: Recommended types of visual aids for each section

slide_count_estimate.description: Recommended number of slides or visual elements

technical_requirements.description: Equipment and setup needs for visual aids
